question: Which one of the following nations law enforcement force is named as "Public Force"?
explanation: Public Force of Costa Rica is Costa Rica's law enforcement force. Costa Rica has no permanent standing army but maintains small forces capable of law enforcement. It was decided not to have a permanent standing military during the aftermath of the 1948 Costa Rican Civil War as the civil war was the bloodiest event in the Costa Rican history killing almost 2000 people.
